<Heading
  as={"h1"}
  className={"openapi__heading"}
  children={"Create organization type"}
>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"post"}
  path={"/api/v1.0/organizations/types"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Creates a single organization type record. Use this endpoint to add a new type to the taxonomy before assigning it to organizations.

**Workflow Example**
1. Decide the Name and Scope (Global or Site) for the new type.
2. If Scope is Site, include SiteId for the owning site.
3. Call [POST /api/v1.0/organizations/types](/docs/api/organizations/create-organization-type) with the new type payload.

**Minimal Required Fields**: Name and Scope (SiteId when Scope is Site).

**Notes**: This API version is deprecated.

  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={undefined}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={{"required":true,"content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"object","description":"Request body for creating or updating an organization type.","properties":{"OrganizationTypeId":{"type":"string","format":"uuid"},"SiteId":{"type":"string","format":"uuid","nullable":true},"Scope":{"type":"string","enum":["Global","Site"]},"Name":{"type":"string"}},"title":"UpdateOrganizationTypeRequest"},"example":{"SiteId":null,"Scope":"Global","Name":"Conference Center"}}}}}
>
  
</RequestSchema>

<StatusCodes
  id={undefined}
  label={undefined}
  responses={{"200":{"description":"Item created.","content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"object","description":"Response wrapper for a single OrganizationType.","properties":{"Item":{"type":"object","description":"Represents a type/category for organizations (event venues).","properties":{"OrganizationTypeId":{"type":"string","format":"uuid","description":"Unique identifier for the organization type."},"CreatedDate":{"type":"string","format":"date-time","description":"Date and time the organization type was created."},"ModifiedDate":{"type":"string","format":"date-time","description":"Date and time the organization type was last modified."},"IsDeleted":{"type":"boolean","description":"Indicates if the organization type has been soft-deleted."},"SiteId":{"type":"string","format":"uuid","nullable":true,"description":"UUID of the site this organization type belongs to. Null for global types."},"Scope":{"type":"string","enum":["Global","Site"],"description":"Scope of the organization type - Global or Site-specific."},"Name":{"type":"string","description":"Display name of the organization type."}},"title":"OrganizationType"},"IsSuccess":{"type":"boolean"},"Errors":{"type":"array","items":{"type":"object","description":"Standard error payload returned by the API when a request fails.","properties":{"StatusCode":{"type":"integer","description":"HTTP status code associated with the failure","example":401},"Message":{"type":"string","description":"Human-readable description of the error","example":"Attempted to perform an unauthorized operation."}},"required":["StatusCode","Message"],"title":"ErrorResponse"}}},"title":"OrganizationTypeItemResponse"}}}}}}
>
  
</StatusCodes>
